title: Gold Mines at Dolaucothi, Wales
description: Known now as the "Dolaucothi Gold Mines" or "Ogofau Gold Mine," this was a major gold mining and ore processing site in the Roman period.

properties.description: Central area of modern works of the Dolaucothi Gold Mine (Wales), verified by eye in Google Earth in October 2012. Dates after BAtlas.
properties.title: Centerpoint of visible mining area
